overview: A journalist could marry the daughter of a tycoon, but prefers a relationship with a married woman. An attorney renounces her lover by greed. A soldier tries to approach a widow on a train. A German couple looking for adventure mistakingly aim for the wrong target, yet find love.
tagline: Eros on the rampage in three delightful sketches concerning love and sexâ€¦ or sex and love?
title: Sex Can Be Difficult
